about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the ultimate cinematic experience with Golden Ticket Simulator – the revolutionary theater simulator that lets you and your friends enjoy unforgettable movie moments in virtual cinemas. Whether you're a movie buff, a social butterfly, or simply someone looking for a new way to spend time with friends, Golden Ticket Simulator provides the perfect platform. 🍿

Features


  • Virtual Theaters: Experience movies in stunningly realistic theaters that you can share with your friends. Choose from a variety of theaters, ranging from classic Art Deco cinemas to modern IMAX experiences.

  • Iconic Movie Scenes: Visit famous film locations and enjoy movies right on the set. Watch a classic at the T-Rex enclosure from "Jurassic Park" or experience a screening aboard a spaceship.

  • Personalized Avatars: Create your own avatar and give it a unique look. Show off your style as you move around the virtual cinema.

  • Exclusive Content: Get access to special screenings, premieres, and Q&A sessions with filmmakers. Discover exclusive bonus content and behind-the-scenes material.

  • Easy Invites: Quickly and easily invite your friends to join your screenings. Share your experiences and make every movie night a social event.

  • Interactive NPC Guests: Encounter our live, Artificial Intelligence-driven cinema NPCs who converse with you in real-time. Enjoy stimulating dialogues, receive bespoke movie recommendations, and enhance the cinematic atmosphere with an exciting buzz.

  • Virtual Concessions: Choose from a wide variety of classic cinema treats and share them with your companions.

  • Dynamic Weather and Time Settings: Experience different times of day and weather conditions in your virtual cinema environment, boosting the realism and engagement of your film viewing.

Golden Ticket Simulator offers an immersive, social, and interactive cinematic experience that redefines the magic of movie watching. Grab your virtual ticket and prepare to dive into a world of films, friendships, and unforgettable moments.

Get your Golden Ticket NOW and experience cinema like never before!


We are at an early stage of development. Feel free to contribute with your own wishes via our Discord channel!
(The content of this page is currently evolving in tandem with our development efforts and will be subject to ongoing refinement.)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.40 GHz / Intel Core i5-2300, 2.80 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7790, 2 GB / GeForce GTX 750Ti, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD FX-8350, 4.00 GHz / Intel Core i5-3470, 3.20 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 590, 8 GB / GeForce GTX 1060, 6 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
